CUT AWAY DURING DEVIL YELL TO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful late summer night.  Crickets chirping, sprink sprinkling. We PAN across one particular lawn, up one particular tree where we see THE PEEPER (Jon Lovitz) sitting on a limb. has a bottle of wine, some sandwiches, a Walkman.  Sudden the lights turn on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Showtime! We see a young mother walk into the room outside the Peep window.  She is wearing business attire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rough day at the office Mrs. Dunleavy? (takes bite of sandwich)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well you'll feel better once you slip off those work clothes and get into some sweats. The mother sits on the bed and pulls off her shoes, rubbi her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my G-D, yes!  I wish you would let me rub those feet.  Of course I wouldn't use my hands.  Heh heh heh heh... He sips some wine. The mother starts to unbutton her blouse.  She takes it o revealing a nice bra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like Victoria just told me her secret. The peeper frantically writes in a dirty notebook.  Mouth the words as he goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thursday the ninth, eight-thirty p.m., first brassiere sighting... (stops writing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will pleasure myself to this image for months.  MONTHS I TELL YOU! The mother starts to unbutton her pants.  Her young son w in wearing a scouts uniform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Scottie Dunleavy.  What unfortunate timing.  You mother was just getting comfy. The son talks to his mother excitedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes, I'm sure you tied many great knots today or whatever.  Now get out. The son, not going anywhere, sits in a chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now what.  This simply won't do. The peeper takes out a cell phone and dials.  The son answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, Scottie.  Why don't you go downstairs like a good boy and let your mother freshen up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a little birdie.  A birdie who wants to see if your mother's panties match her bra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my G-D Scottie.  Is there a man up our tree? The peeper gets nervous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell her no.  Tell her it's just a big bird. The peeper starts flapping his arms and making bird noise We SEE Scottie with his sling shot.  The mother nods yes. shoots it.  It hits the peeper square in the head.  He fa to the ground with a thud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Dunleavy, please come help me.  And wear your bikini. The peeper looks up.  He sees Scottie pushing a televisio out the window.  It lands on top of the peeper.  He's dea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The peeper is zooming down a hole, walls of dirt racing b all sides. The peeper is falling down, down, down.  The whole way screaming like a five-year old girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the tunnel turn into more of a slide now and the peeper races towards the opening which is lit by fire.  H SCREAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the GATE/WALL OF FLAMES.  We hear screaming.  Wham We see the peeper come flying through the flames and land a heap in a shallow pit of coals. Dazed, he stands and we see other people shooting through fire wall at different levels.  (NOTE: All the arrivals clothes are now burned & shredded).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome! The peeper looks left to see the GATEKEEPER standing at h station greeting the new SOULS with mock cheer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I in hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think? A GIANT BIRD appears and bites the peeper's crotch area. leave the peeper in the pit and tilt up to...

dialogues.speaker: MUSIC UP
dialogues.text: The VAST and insane kingdom of Hell.  A road leads toward like the yellow brick road only with fire and coals.  We the black castle in the distance.  The camera zooms into castle, to one particular window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like an American teenager's room - models, a dresse heavy metal posters (tons of OZZY stuff) everywhere (but bed - Devils don't sleep).  Nicky is air guitaring to the song.  Over at the stereo, we see the cassette playing ti

dialogues.speaker: "NICKY'S MONSTER METAL MIX."
dialogues.text: The head demon, JIMMY THE DEMON, opens the door, scaring NICKY who falls backward into the table, breaking it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (embarrassed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father wants to see you and your brothers in the throne room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, but Jimmy, when the house is rockin', don't forget the knockin'!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ADRIAN and CASSIUS are playing darts.  They're aiming for people's faces that are coming through the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it.  He's finally retiring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been waiting on this day for ten thousand years. He throws a dart that hits one of the heads in the forehe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If the old man picks me to take over Hell, I'll keep the torture going twenty four seven.  No breaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well Dad says it's the breaks that make the torture.  You have to let people feel a sense of relief. Cassius whips a dart which hits one of the HUMAN DARTBOAR in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then again, the beauty of Dad retiring is what he says doesn't matter anymore. Cassius pulls out the dart.  The eye comes with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that. Cassius throws the eye on the ground and stomps it.  THWA It splatters like a grape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was that really necessary? Nicky enters sheepishly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, how's Daddy's little girl doing today?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good, thanks. Cassius snaps his fingers in Nicky's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Hey. Hey.  Wanna mind wrestle? Cassius' eyes start glowing red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, I'll take a rain check on0 Nicky is slammed into a nearby desk as if by an invisible force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got ya!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (picking up his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, you got me... Nicky's head slams back down again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got ya, again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (picking head up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got me for sure, yes... He grabs a lamp off the desk and cracks himself over the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got ya!  Now here's the big finish... Nicky frowns as he finds his own right hand heading for h own crotch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.  Please Cassius... Nicky's hand is being possessed.  It gets closer and clos until it latches on to Nicky's crotch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaaah. Cassius concentrates even harder, making Nicky twist his hand.  Nicky screams even louder.  Adrian smiles.  They d notice that DAD, wearing a sweatsuit (and with very small devil horns), enters behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you boys doing? Cassius releases Nicky's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, Dad.  Just re-arranging the furniture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cassius, didn't I tell you to stay out of your brother's mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I forgot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe this will help you remember. Dad's eyes flash red and Cassius punches himself hard in nose, sending him back against the wall and down to the floor. Dad gives Nicky a wink.  Nicky smiles.  Dad has an air of confidence and power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now everybody sit down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Dad, I'm almost finished laying down my monsters of metal compilation tape.  I really think it's a masterpiece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, kid, we'll listen to it later. He leads the boys to the throne area.  We see outside the window the peeper staring in sexily.  Dad looks, shakes h head.  Just then, THE BIRD appears and attacks him.  Dad closes the curtains. Nicky, Adrian and Cassius sit on little stools at the foo his throne.  Dad lights a cigarette with his finger, the of which glows red like a cigarette lighter and looks dow his three sons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My dad, your granddad, Lucifer, was thrown out of Heaven by G-d and rules here in hell for ten thousand years. And after this ten thousand years had passed, he decided to abdicate his throne... Confused, Nicky sheepishly raises his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...to step aside. (Nicky lowers his hand)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and let me become the ruler of hell. This, as some of you might know, is my ten thousandth year as Prince of Darkness.  So I think the time has come to discuss who will succeed me. Jimmy the Demon walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knock, knock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Jimmy. He whispers in Dad's ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, that's not what I said.  He can keep his thumbs, but the fingers gotta go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning to leave)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and don't forget, you're shoving a pineapple up Hitler's ass at four o'clock. Dad nods, and Jimmy shuffles out.  Dad turns his attentio back to his sons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was a very difficult decision, because I have three wonderful sons.  I mean, Adrian, so smart, so ruthless. And Cassius, so strong, so tough.  And Nicky, so...so...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about coming up with anything.  It's cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such a sweet boy.  But after much thought and careful consideration, I've decided that the ruler for the next ten thousand years is going to have to be...me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dumbfounded)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hallelujah. They all look at Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean...tough break.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The important thing for the stability of our rule is to maintain the balance between good and evil.  And I don't think any of you are ready for that responsibility yet.  You need the wisdom that comes only with the passage of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad!  This is Hoyashit. Dad glares.  Cassius goes FLYING BACK.  One of the Human Dartboards laughs.  Cassius whips a dart and hits him in tongue.  Jimmy enters and points at his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.  Right.  Send him in. (to the boys)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, boys.  I've got to get back to work. Nicky, Cassius and Adrian start filing out.  Adrian stops

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure about this decision, Dad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm telling you, pal, it's the right thing to do. HITLER (in a French maid's outfit), is being brought in b Jimmy.  They head towards the closet. Inside the closet is a crate of pineapples.  Hitler picks a relatively small one.  Dad shakes his head "no."  Dad w over to the closet.  Hitler picks out a really big pineap Dad nods "yes."  Hitler sadly hands it to Dad.  Jimmy ben Hitler over and as Dad raises the fruit...

dialogues.speaker: HITLER'S EYES
dialogues.text: As the pineapple's jammed up his ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy schnit!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cassius and Adrian are standing by the road still flowing with souls.  Both are pissed.  There's a big, ugly, Bigfo looking MONSTER hanging out with them, kind of nodding al

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You work your ass off for ten thousand years, hurting people, helping others hurt people, then you get a decision like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he's dead serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just such a slap in the face. Adrian turns to the Monster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, excuse me, we're having a private conversation here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, get out of here!  Beat it! Cassius insanely snaps his fingers in the Monster's face. The Monster shrugs and walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty-thousand years ago, Grandpa Lucifer said, "It is better to rule in hell than serve in heaven."  Well, I'm getting tired of serving in Hell.  We need a place where we can rule. Cassius throws a rock at the Monster.  He yelps, then tur around, motioning like he's thinking about coming back. Cassius sees this and gets enraged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh you wanna be a big man?  Bring it on!! Let's see what you got! The Monster, upon further reflection, throws his hands up an "aw phooey" gesture and continues walking away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I thought!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Cassius)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could you concentrate for five seconds?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am concentrating.  Where can we rule?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think about...Earth? Cassius seems to think this isn't a bad idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could create our own hell there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saying we go up there and kill everyone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eventually, Cassius.  But first we corrupt as many as we can so that when we do destroy them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...their damned souls will be ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's our time, brother. The two look at each other.  They start running toward th fire wall.  Knocking souls out of their way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, what are you doing?!? They get closer to the fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't go through there.  The fire flows in, not out. They dive through the fire wall.  It FREEZES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know something?  You guys suck!  You really suck! Sirens go off.  Dogs start barking.  Lights flash.  And w hear the sound of DAMNED SOULS hitting the back of the firewall hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad and Nicky are listening to one of Nicky's metal mix tapes.  We hear the end of Pink Floyd's "Comfortably Numb Pause.  Dad exhales.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that was an experience.  "You are only coming through in waves."  That line blows my mind every time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Definitely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care what kind of mood you're in at the start of that song.  When it's over, that mood has been altered.  Wow. Great shit.  What's next?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I thought that after messing with your head, I'd give you a little kick in the keester. Hits the tape player.  "Enter Sandman" blasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this, Metal-lick-a?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Metallica, Dad.  Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just playing with you. Dad and Nicky dance to the song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.  After careful consideration, I regretfully have to decline. ON PERSON HE'S TALKING TO: DAN MARINO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, man, I'm just asking for one Superbowl ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In exchange for eternal damnation of your soul?  You're too nice of a guy for me to want to do that to you, Mr. Marino.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it for Namath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but Joe was coming here anyways. Just go back to Earth and enjoy your records and the Hall of Fame and the beautiful family and all that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is bullshit, man. (gets up to leave)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna win the Superbowl this year, with or without you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you're talking. Dan exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a good devil, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I also happen to be a Jets fan. Nicky and Dad share a laugh which is interrupted by faint sirens.  The Gatekeeper enters in a hurry and falls to hi knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your highness, Cassius and Adrian have escaped from hell.  They went through the fire, and they broke it.  I think they took the New York tunnel.  I tried to stop them, but they overpowered me, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, boy.  Oh boy.  Calm down.  Get off your knees. The Gatekeeper stands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for being so understanding, your worship.  You're the man.  You've always been the man. Dad's EYES GLOW RED as the Gatekeeper stands up.  Two hug boobs grow out of either side of the Gatekeeper's head. only see them from the front for a second. From behind the gatekeeper, we see the boobs but not the nipples as he talks to Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Nicky)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm lucky to get away with just the head boobs, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coulda been much worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I'm thinkin'... Dad is staring off.  He looks shaken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is bad, Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How bad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna die, Nicky.  If the gates are broken, no new souls can get in, which means I'll start to deteriorate into nothing. GRANDPA LUCIFER enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's with all the whoo-whoo noises?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything's fine, pop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last time you said that the renaissance happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, pop, just go back to your room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (regarding gateskeeper)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I take him with me and have sex with his head?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, pop.  Whatever you want. The gatekeeper walks towards Lucifer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, this is gonna be a whole new lifestyle for me, isn't it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the coals are cooling down on the road and the DAM SOULS in hell are sneaking off. The DEMONS are baffled and don't quite know what to do. Dad, Jimmy and Nicky walk to the frozen fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?  Where are we? We keep HEARING people hit behind the frozen fire with lo thuds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's getting through that.  The fire is solid as a rock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta get this bad boy burning again. Ideas?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To do that Cassius and Adrian have to come back through the other way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So go get 'em, Dad!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm too weak.  The process has already begun. Dad holds up his hand.  His pink is hanging by a thread. see the bigfoot MONSTER grunt disgusted by the sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So go get 'em, Jimmy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just a demon, Nicky.  I don't got devil blood in me.  I'd last two minutes up there with your brothers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not saying it's up to me? The MONSTER puts his hands over his eyes shaking his head if to say, "oh no."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never been to Earth.  I've never even slept over at some other dude's house!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the spawn of Satan.  You got it in you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky, the worst thing that could happen on Earth is you get killed, in which case, boom, you end up back here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you telling me I have to go to Earth and kill my brothers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not go.  They left together at the exact same time.  They gotta come back together at the exact same time. Dad takes an ornate flask from his robe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here.  Get them drunk from this.  One sip and they'll be trapped inside.  Once you've got both of them, you bring the flask back through the gate. Dad's pinky is hanging.  Jimmy pulls it off and examines The Monster gags.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your ol' man's got less than a week. Nicky looks petrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  This can't be happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son, just do your best. Nicky looks teary eyed.  The moment is broken by the Mons who runs in and pushes Nicky through the fire. Nicky goes through the solid fire wall.  PAUSE.  The Mons taps his own wrist and looks at Dad as if to say, "gotta a move on."

dialogues.speaker: A SIGN
dialogues.text: PAN DOWN to the darkened bowels of the old station, betwe two tracks, to a putrid puddle.  Nicky breaks through the surface, sputtering.  We hear a rumbling in the near distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Earth.  The Blue Marble.  This doesn't look too bad. Nicky sees a fast approaching light, furrows his brow and

dialogues.speaker: WHAMMM
dialogues.text: EXT. GATES OF HELL - MOMENTS LATER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky comes shooting through the solid fire wall and land the coal pit.  His Dad limps back to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were gone ten seconds.  What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got hit by a big light that was attached to a lot of metal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a train, son.  Don't stand in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I guess I'm going to have to take a mulligan on this one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, Nicky, get back up there. (his ear falls off)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try to hurry. Nicky climbs up and heads back toward the fire wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky makes it back through the hole.  Looks both ways an hops out of the hole.  He carefully crosses the tracks an stopped by the sight of a bulldog, BEEFY, on the other si In his mouth is one of those signs car service drivers us identify their passengers at the airport.  On the sign is scrawled "NICKY." Nicky and Beefy stare at each other a beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Nicky. Beefy drops the sign from his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (voice of Sandy Wernick)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, terrific!!  Now get off the track and come with me, shitstains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The throng of commuters making their way through the term are giving a wide berth to the filthy man who's looking around suspiciously, talking to the dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My name's Beefy.  I'm an old friend of your father's.  He's asked me to help you out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just need to find my brothers and be on my way, Beefy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not gonna be easy.  Your brothers can possess people.  So they probably won't look like themselves.  You have to be suspicious of everyone. Nicky looks at Beefy warily for a beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, "bro," this jig is up... (pulling out the flask)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just get in the bottle.  Just slide right on in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not me, moron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.  Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BLIND PREACHER rants outside the entrance.  People put money in his pot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh how the Lord loves you.  All his children. (passerby puts in money)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thanks you for your kindness. (another woman puts in money)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God bless, Ma'am.  The Lord loves you... The Lord loves you... We see Nicky and Beefy walk up from behind.  The PREACHER sniffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Lord does not love you.  I sense...pure evil. (thrusts his cross in Nicky's face)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You make the Lord very nervous. (feeling hot)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm burning...ahhh. (running away)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil walks among us! He runs off screaming, wildly bumping into people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Lord, save us from Hell's beast! He gets off course and runs right into a subway entrance. disappears.  Beefy turns to Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Makin' friends already.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shivering a little)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's freezing up here, Beefy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're on Earth now, kid.  Gonna have the same physical needs and limitations a human has.  We'll stop by K-mart.  Get you some warm clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I also have this odd pain in my mid section.  Kind of a hollow feeling...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That pain is hunger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Thanks much.  You know what's nice about you, Valerie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Up the street, Adrian's eyes redden.  NICKY looks like he been stunned by something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your juicy, heart-shaped ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shocked and confused)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I don't know why I just said that. I meant to say that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian's eyes flashing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I've always wanted to have sex with a gross pig.  What do you say we go behind that dumpster, pull our pants down and see what happens? Valerie's very hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a jerk. She turns and walks away.  Nicky looks over and sees Adri His inner voice speaks to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shouldn't have come here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, get out of my mind! Adrian's eyes flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Valerie! She stops and turns.  Nicky RAISES his fist to resist Adrian's force.  It's too much.  His middle finger comes giving her the "finger."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell's your problem? She runs away crying.  Nicky turns to Adrian who's still across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian, you gotta come back to Hell. Dad's sick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's sick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, he needs souls to live.  When you guys left, you broke the gates.  We gotta get the gates burning again before he dies. Adrian processes this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He should have thought of that before he denied me my birthright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well maybe you should go back and talk it over with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about this?  I stay here enjoying my Schnapps and you go back. Nicky's body jerks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian, please... Nicky, fighting control over his body, walks slowly and crazily into the middle of the street where he sees a lar truck bearing down on him. JOHN and PETER get blood splattered on them.  Peter looks down to see the "666" forms in blood on their clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check this out.  The number of the beast. They laugh and hi-five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan Rather speaks to the camera.  Over his shoulder we se graphic of the Arch-Decon's face.  NOTE (Arch-Decon is a up religious figure that appeared earlier in the script.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reverberations from Arch-Decon Donnelly's shocking speech are still being felt throughout the city.  Today, some disgruntled cast members of the play CATS broke the fourth wall in a most hostile manner.

dialogues.speaker: VIDEO FOOTAGE
dialogues.text: A few CATS are down in the aisle physically pushing aroun shocked audience members.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...But even that does not come close to what happened today on Live with Regis and Kathy Lee.

dialogues.speaker: VIDEO FOOTAGE
dialogues.text: The set of Regis and Kathy Lee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I was driving to work today, and some bozo in a Cadillac cut me off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, that's terrible, Reege...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I followed him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You followed him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I followed him all the way downtown, and when he gets out of the car, I reach under my seat and pull out an aluminum bat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You keep a bat under your seat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Recently, yes!  So I run up behind this guy, and start bashing his brains in with this bat, and it made me feel happy!  Did you ever see THE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, great movie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was DeNiro! The blue haired lady AUDIENCE is crying.  The TV turns of We PULL BACK to see that we are in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beefy turns to Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your brothers are upsetting the balance of good and evil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can I do about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't do jack shit... unless you learn your evil powers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody's as evil as my brothers.  Those dudes put the wick in wicked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go get a soda out of the fridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But those are my roommate's sodas...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (high-pitched mocking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "But those are my roommate's sodas..." Does that sound like a statement the son of the devil would make? Nicky, ashamed, gets a Coke out of the fridge and places on the coffee table.  He and Beefy sit on the couch and s at the Coke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have the power to change the cola in that can into any other liquid - engine oil, bat's blood, moose piss.  You just have to release the evil within you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release the evil?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just saying, there's wickedness in you... I can tell from your snores. Nicky stares at the can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release your evil... Nicky frowns and bites his lip.  The can rattles a little

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Todd is standing in the doorway.  Beefy runs to the fire escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it's your living room night.  But can I finish watching the Globetrotters' game out here?  To me it's classic Comedia Dellarte.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TV clicks on.  We see TODD sit down and look at the T Nicky's behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What an odd game, folks.  The powerhouse 85-0 Harlem Globetrotters, who normal run circles around the 0-85 Nationals, seem to be struggling to find their groove in front of their hometown fans. A Globetrotter makes a fancy pass to another player, who makes a fancy pass to CORNROWS who starts doing some VINT GLOBETROTTERS FANCY DRIBBLING.  The REF blows the whistle makes the travelling signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's walking, get him a bus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, another awful call.  There is no way that was travelling. Ref takes ball from Cornrows, who gets in the Ref's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's with all these crazy calls?  You gotta watch that shit, we haven't lost a game in 53 years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Technical foul! Ref snaps just like Cassius in the players' face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That guy in the striped shirt snaps his fingers like someone I know...

dialogues.speaker: ON TV
dialogues.text: The ref mind wrestles four globetrotters to simultaneousl slam their heads on the scorers table again and again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like the work of a brother...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A black guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's Cassius, yes. Nicky races for the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the ref taunts the crowd, a fan wearing a Globetrotter shirt yells out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get your head out your ass, ref!  The kids came to see the Globetrotters win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, so you wanna lip off to me? Unsportsmanlike conduct on the big mouth in the Globetrotter's shirt.  Take ten points off for the Globetrotters. The Globetrotter's score on the board goes from 46 to 36.

dialogues.speaker: ON STANDS
dialogues.text: The KIDS are crying.

dialogues.speaker: ON COURT
dialogues.text: The halftime buzzer sounds.  The Globetrotters walk off t court.  The crowd BOOS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In all my years of basketball, I was never so happy to hear a halftime buzzer.  Folk, I'm afraid if the second half doesn't get any better, I expect a full scale riot. A spotlight points to an announcer at mid-court.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time for the Globetrotter's halftime half-court heave throw, where one lucky fan will have a shot at ten thousand dollars! A brick lands at the announcer's feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if he makes it, everyone in attendance today will receive a free pizza.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIGUEL, wearing a big basketball jersey, looks nervous. has a pass on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I ain't goin' out there and taking the shot.  These people have gone crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take the shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Nicky runs out on the court, Peter turns to John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look who's back from the dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six, six, six, pick up sticks. They high-five.  The only happy fans in their section.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Todd's baffled, looking at his roommate on TV.  Beefy is watching from the fire escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's Nicky doing down there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trying to capture his brother in a flask and preserve the balance of good and evil on Earth. Todd looks over, suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you just talk?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The court announcer covers his mic and whispers to Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You better win these people some free pizza.  Looks like they're about to start killing each other.

dialogues.speaker: STANDS
dialogues.text: A BUSINESSMAN pushes a very old SODA GUY down an aisle of stairs.

dialogues.speaker: COURTSIDE
dialogues.text: The court announcer hands Nicky the ball.  He looks at it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release the evil. His eyes get red.  Staring at the ball, it explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, too much evil.. Bill Walton's hair is on fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think that ball just blew up.  And yes, my hair is aflame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning to sideline)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could I get another ball? The court announcer throws out another ball.  Nicky stare it again with red eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I command you not to blow up and go into that metal circle. Nicky throws an underhand shot.  The ball arcs through th air and is about to go in when the ref comes out of nowhe and swats it away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get that crap outta here! The crowd BOOS!  Nicky and the ref stare at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you're having fun, Cassius, but you gotta come back to Hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look around you, Nicky.  We're in Hell. The New Hell.

dialogues.speaker: STANDS
dialogues.text: We see FITZIE, sitting between TWO PREGNANT WOMEN, raisin the roof.

dialogues.speaker: COURTSIDE
dialogues.text: As the crowd BOOS, Nicky runs over and grabs the micropho

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen up, New York.  Your souls are in great danger... Nicky gets hit by a hot dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, how about this?  I get one more shot.  The ref will cover me.  I miss it, the Globetrotters forfeit the game. I make it, he doesn't ref the second half and we all start conducting ourselves like decent human beings again. The crowd is silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we get free pizza. The crowd roars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill Walton's hair is now burnt looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's safe to say we're all rooting for this bizarre and hideous looking man. Bill Walton reaches over to an old lady sitting near him. takes off her wig, leaving behind her bald head, and puts wig on his head in order to cover his burnt hair. The crowd starts YELLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky!  Nicky!  Nicky!

dialogues.speaker: STANDS
dialogues.text: John and Peter are yelling the loudest.

dialogues.speaker: COURTSIDE
dialogues.text: The ref walks to half-court and hands Nicky the ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, Dad got very sick when you left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard.  I'm glad he's dying.  It's my turn now. Nicky's eyes get red, he starts dribbling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beefy is watching, transfixed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take him to the hole, Nicky. (Todd stares)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, woof!  Woof! Todd looks at Beefy, terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see CORNROWS and some other Globetrotters are coming b from the locker room.  They stop to watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky pushes the ball up the court while the ref plays extremely tight defense.  Nicky fakes one way, then heads toward the basket.  The ref stays tight.  Nicky's eyes ar redder than ever.  He fakes left, he fakes right.  He dribbles behind the back, dribbles between the legs, then takes his momentum up toward the basket.  He jumps from t foul line and flies through the air.  He emits a crazy, b curdling, devil yell.

dialogues.speaker: SHOT CLOCK
dialogues.text: It reads: 666. Popcorn and sodas EXPLODE. Cornrow's cornrows POP open into a GIANT AFRO.

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON NICKY
dialogues.text: Nicky's head starts turning and does a 360 (like the Exorcist).  He ends his flight by slamming down a thunder dunk, cracking the backboard's glass into pieces.  He hit the ref on the way down.  The crowd CHEERS, finally happy again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never doubt my skills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn, I gotta learn how to do that.

dialogues.speaker: MID-COURT
dialogues.text: Nicky sees the ref is lying on the basketball arena floor covered in glass.  He gets up slowly

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's nuts.  When'd you learn that shit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Cassius.  Maybe it was the super devil juice Dad gave me.  HE thought I might need it for just such an occasion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Super devil juice?  Give it over.  Let's go best two out of three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulls out the flask)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  No way.  Dad said it was only for me. The ref rips the flask from Nicky and drinks. Cassius screams like bloody hell as he is sucked out of t ref's mouth and into the bottle.  WHOOSH!  The ref slumps the floor.

dialogues.speaker: STANDS
dialogues.text: Still quiet until John and Peter rush to Nicky and bow.

dialogues.speaker: COURTSIDE
dialogues.text: Nicky peers into the flask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn you, Nicky!  There ain't no super devil juice in here! Nicky caps the flask.  Nicky waves to the stunned, but appreciative crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A homemade cake is laid out.  It reads: CONGRATULATIONS, NICKY.  JOHN, TODD, PETER AND BEEFY are there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So your father's the devil, you're a talking dog sent from Hell, and you guys are who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a couple of big fans of Nicky and the work his Dad does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By the way, Nicky.  Check this out. He spins his Black Sabbath backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's Ozzy trying to say there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolutely nothing.  The Blizzard always came straight with his messages.  But wrap your minds around this one. Nicky gets up and we see his is sitting on a hibachi.  He on a James Taylor album and plays it backwards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I command you in the name of the Lucifer to spread the blood of the innocent. John and Peter look at each other, shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No wonder your uncle's so weird...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta say this cake tastes a little funny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I dumped a fat sack of reefer in the mix.  Tried to spice up the bash. Nicky takes a big bite of cake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's reefer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN UP from Popeye's laying everywhere.  Everyone's laugh hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.  One more time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not again, fellas.  It kind of hurts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please.  You got to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (resigned)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right... Nicky loosens up his neck and makes his head go around 36 degrees.  Everyone cracks up, high fives.  Even Todd LAUG PAN OVER to Beefy, who has bloodshot eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to get baked like this with my first girlfriend, Heather.  We'd get so stoned she would forget I was a dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She was human?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, she was a sewer rat.  Man, that pissed my parents off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dated a Japanese girl once.  My parents disapproved.  Not cause she's Japanese, but cause she was only fifteen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm only fifteen...thousand years old. Everyone cracks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was in love one time but she said I wasn't financially reliable enough.  And she needed that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By she, do you mean he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Busted. (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you feelin' over there, Satan Abdul Jabar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little strange.  I can't stop thinking about this girl, Valerie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  Did she hurt you?  Do you miss her?  Need a shoulder to cry on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy, Liberace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, would you grow up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We had the greatest afternoon of my life until Adrian made me tell her she had a heart-shaped ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you love her.  But what do I know? I'm baked out of my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, too.  We're gonna get going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys want to stay?  I have a futon in my bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a big pass, Elton John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to see Ozzy play at the Meadowlands, right now.  Wanna come, Nicky?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No thanks.  I'm afraid I wouldn't be able to give Ozzy the focus he deserves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, that chick must be the real deal, then.  Later on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See ya, fellas. They leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You better snap out of it soon, kid. Cause we're going after Adrian tomorrow. Seven AM.  Nighty, night. He falls asleep and starts snoring.  We hear the SOUND of THREE LITTLE GIRLS singing "Ring Around The Rosie" as he exhales.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is the most frightening thing I have ever seen. Nicky stands and moves to the window.  He looks out longi over the sleeping city... achingly.  RACK FOCUS behind hi we see Todd nodding encouragingly in the reflection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Todd.  Which way to the Parson's School of Design?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky walks around the corner. SIGN READS: "Parson's School -  Student Housing" Nicky is standing in front of the dorm rooms.  He looks u Scanning the windows, he picks up a scent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (he sniffs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coconuts... Nicky goes to the fire escape and starts to climb.  His n leads him.  He reaches the window, sniffing heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STUDENT is standing in the window draped in silks, feel his nipples with his legs crossed like the guy in "Silenc the Lambs."  The student is startled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You smell like coconuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's "Comptoir Sud Pacific."  Makes me feel like a hula girl.  Which is kinda what I'm going for.  Wanna come in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No thanks.  I'm looking for a girl named Valerie who also smells like coconuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valerie Doran?  Two floors up, one window over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, much.  Good luck with the genital tucking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't need luck.  I'm good. Nicky floats away.  A few seconds later, he floats back, holding up the flask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andrew. Nicky nods and floats off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky crouches outside her window and peers in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool music.  She is up late.  Working by candlelight on a fantastic design.  Something's not working.  She drapes a beautiful fabric over another.  She smiles at the combination.  She is happy being creative.  Nicky feels h heart swell as he watches her.

dialogues.speaker: ON NICKY
dialogues.text: He's so enraptured he leans forward trying to kiss her. head bumps the window.  She turns, startled.  She sees th beaming Nicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky?  Oh my G-d.  Stay right there. Pause.  Valerie opens the window and sprays a can of mace right in Nicky's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh that stings!  My eyes are on fire! Nicky stands up and stumbles around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you thinking coming here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure, but it didn't involve getting blinded with poison. He bounces off the front rail, stumbles backward and goes flying over the back rail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Nicky hurtling toward the street.  Holding his eye

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my G-d, I'm so sorry! Suddenly he stops.  Suspended above ground.  Valerie does hear the expected thud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicky? He floats up, but he can't see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valerie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you dead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I'm floating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would you be floating?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.  Maybe it's because of your sweet voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I supposed to not be freaked out right now?  Because I am. He's floating up.  He slows down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't see you but I can smell you. And you make me feel alive in a way I've never felt before. CUT TO REVEAL he's floating outside the student's window. The student's dripping candle wax on his belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got the wrong window again, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.  Sorry, Andrew.  Valerie? Nicky resumes floating up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm over here, Nicky!  To the left. Nicky is parallel with her.  He hovers in front of her, e still watering.  She punches Nicky in the face, and he fl back ten feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, just because you're floating doesn't mean I'm gonna forget about you giving me the finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That wasn't me.  I was being possessed by my brother, Adrian.  He's the one who call you a gross pig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean, "possessed?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember when I told you my Dad was in Hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that's because he's the Devil. And he wants to keep his throne for another ten-thousand years.  Which is fine with me, but not with my brothers, so they broke out of Hell, causing my dad...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... "The Devil?"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...to decompose.  And I love my  Dad very much.  So I came to Earth to save him but then crazy eyes stole my flask and I met you and...well, my dog tells me I just might be in love with you. His vision is clearing and he can start to see her.  She totally in shock but still here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, now I get that "deep south" joke. Nicky laughs.  Valerie joins in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know if I should believe you. Nicky starts to drop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta believe me.  You gotta believe in the butterflies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, I do.  Get back up here. He floats up to her holding out his hand.  Nervously, she takes his hand and suddenly she is lifting off and they a flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fly past the EMPIRE STATE BUILDING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is amazing. They soar past some more buildings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The preacher sense something.  He looks to the sky, then holds the cross from around his neck as high as he can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
